name: Atmosphere API
description:
Instantly access empirical models of atmospheric density and  composition that are recommended by the Committee on Space Research (COSPAR) for  satellite drag calculations.

API requests must contain a key "API-Key" in the header (see code samples). Obtain a key from  [here](https://developer.amentum.io).


Help us improve the quality of our web APIs by completing our 2 minute survey [here](https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CTDTRBN).

Amentum Pty Ltd is not responsible nor liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred as a result of using the API.

Copyright [Amentum Pty Ltd](https://amentum.space) 2021.
